segments.text: Hello , Steven , what are you doing now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am preparing a birthday party for Julia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I be of any help to you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , could you help to blow up some balloons ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , would you please clean the livingroom ? You know I'm too busy .
segments.speaker: S2
